hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: Building Modern Web Applications
hero.description: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences with React and TypeScript.

descriptions.vite: Fast build tool for modern web

proactiveProblemSolver.name: Proactive Problem Solver
proactiveProblemSolver.description: Excel at visualizing UI/UX solutions while analyzing requirements, demonstrating strong analytical thinking that helps identify optimal frontend approaches before implementation begins.

growthOrientedLearner.name: Growth-Oriented Learner
growthOrientedLearner.description: Encouraged by challenging frontend projects and unsolved UI problems, finding genuine satisfaction in learning new React patterns, design systems, and modern web technologies.

collaborativeTeamPlayer.name: Collaborative Team Player
collaborativeTeamPlayer.description: Work effectively with designers, backend developers, and management to establish productive workflows. Value knowledge sharing and believe diverse perspectives lead to better user experiences.

qualityFocused.name: Quality-Focused
qualityFocused.description: Deliver production-ready, responsive code from the first iteration with attention to performance optimization, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.

mentorshipMindset.name: Mentorship Mindset
mentorshipMindset.description: Enjoy helping teammates understand React concepts and frontend best practices, readily investing time in research when encountering new libraries or design patterns.

creativeUiUxApproach.name: Creative UI/UX Approach
creativeUiUxApproach.description: Bring modern solutions to frontend challenges, focusing on user experience and modern design implementation.

longTermCommitment.name: Long-term Commitment
longTermCommitment.description: Interested in building lasting professional relationships and stable employment where I can contribute to sustained frontend excellence and team growth.

resultsDriven.name: Results-Driven
resultsDriven.description: Highly motivated to demonstrate value through quality frontend delivery and committed to proving myself as a reliable team member in international development environments.

analyticalThinking.name: Analytical Thinking
analyticalThinking.description: Systematic approach to breaking down complex problems and making data-driven decisions in frontend development.

crossBrowserCompatibility.name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
crossBrowserCompatibility.description: Ensuring consistent user experience across different browsers and devices with thorough testing and optimization.

responsiveDesignExpertise.name: Responsive Design Expertise
responsiveDesignExpertise.description: Creating fluid, mobile-first designs that work seamlessly across all screen sizes and devices.

internationalCommunication.name: International Communication
internationalCommunication.description: Effective communication in international teams with English proficiency (B1-B2) and learning German for European markets.

advertisingAggregator.title: Advertising Aggregator Platform
advertisingAggregator.description: Frontend development for monetization platform targeting content creators. Built responsive admin dashboard with interactive analytics charts, resource verification interface, and financial management system.
advertisingAggregator.shortDescription: React dashboard for content monetization with analytics and financial management

features.analytics: Interactive analytics dashboard with real-time statistics
features.verification: Resource verification interface for multiple platforms
features.financial: Financial management dashboard with revenue tracking
features.roleBasedUI: Role-based UI with different views for users, admins, and partners
features.errorHandling: Complete responsive frontend with global error handling

challenges.multiPlatform: Creating verification interface for multiple platforms

graceBakery.title: Grace Bakery E-commerce Platform
graceBakery.description: SPA application for bakery with complete order lifecycle. Built advanced product catalog with filtering, intelligent cart system, multilingual interface, and responsive admin panel.
graceBakery.shortDescription: Complete e-commerce solution with multilingual support and advanced features

features.productCatalog: Advanced product catalog with filtering, search, and pagination
features.cartSystem: Intelligent cart system supporting guest users with automatic cart merging
features.multilingual: Multilingual interface (Russian/German) with real-time language switching
features.adminPanel: Responsive admin panel for product and order management
features.formValidation: Integrated form validation with comprehensive error handling

challenges.cartMerging: Implementing automatic cart merging for guest users
challenges.realTimeLanguage: Real-time language switching without page reload
challenges.performance: Performance optimization through virtualization and memoization

portfolioSpa.title: Portfolio SPA
portfolioSpa.description: Modern, responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features dark/light theme switching, internationalization, interactive animations, and performance optimization.
portfolioSpa.shortDescription: Personal portfolio demonstrating latest React patterns and best practices

features.performance: Performance-optimized with lazy loading and code splitting

challenges.themeImplementation: Implementing theme switching with CSS variables

wishbagMobile.title: WishBag Mobile App
wishbagMobile.description: React Native application for couples to manage shared wishlists. Cross-platform mobile application with modern UI/UX patterns and real-time synchronization.
wishbagMobile.shortDescription: Cross-platform mobile app for shared wishlist management

features.crossPlatform: Cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android
